alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley; Moore; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 10:31PM CDT until May 25 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR SHERMAN...EASTERN DALLAM...NORTHWESTERN MOORE AND NORTHERN HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 1031 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Stratford to 4 miles south of Conlen to 11 miles north of Hartley to 5 miles south of Dalhart to 15 miles south of Ware, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Stratford, Hartley, Cactus and Conlen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
